citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
(2) The use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injury.
* A male boxer ("George" #121) was observed to have a deep, harsh, non-productive cough upon exertion.
Licensee stated that he noticed the cough yesterday, however has not yet consulted a veterinarian about the cough
nor scheduled any appointment for examination of the dog. Licensee must confer with a veterinarian about an
appropriate diagnosis/examination/treatment plan. Licensee must maintain documentation of the consultation with
any prescribed recommendations or treatments and have available upon request.
** To be corrected by: 1/15/15
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)                    REPEAT
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
(2) The use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injury.
* A male boxer ("George" #121) was observed to have a deep, harsh, non-productive cough upon exertion.
Licensee stated that he noticed the cough yesterday, however has not yet consulted a veterinarian about the cough
nor scheduled any appointment for examination of the dog. Licensee must confer with a veterinarian about an
appropriate diagnosis/examination/treatment plan. Licensee must maintain documentation of the consultation with
any prescribed recommendations or treatments and have available upon request.
** To be corrected by: 1/15/15
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee.
